issue.title: [CF 259] Condition Reactive Spell for Raging Blow bug
issue.body:
The condition for Reactive Spell - Raging Blow (Warrior) seems to check for rage also. Raging Blow is only usable while an enrage effekt is aktive on you. So this condition should only check if Raging Blow has an enrage effekt which activates it, not if there´s enough rage to use it.


> Posted by CurseForge user Rhyn23 | Imported from CurseForge issue #259 | Raw

comments.body:
Post the export string of the icon that you are having issues with. To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click on the arrow next to the editbox labeled "The editbox of sharing...". Select the "Export to string" option, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

pretty long condition series: i want the icon to show Battleshout if off cd and all other dmg spells are on cd. So it should only show up in a free global cd and if under a certain rage treshold.

the problem occures with raging blow. i want it to check: if 1,2sec cd left on raging blow OR if raging blow is unusable because of reactive state failure (no enrage effect on me).

doesn´t seem to work the way i did it. i would be happy if you could help me here, thanks alot for this great addon


> Posted by CurseForge user Rhyn23

Alright, I know what's going on here. Try r157.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
